question: 4 weeks and 4 days to lose 12-15 pounds? 140 lb 5"6? is this achievable?
question_content: i am willing to work really hard i go to the gym 6 days a week an hour of cardio everyday nd 20 min walk in the evenin 15 mins of weights aswell. I will be keeping my diet very strict too cutting out all junk about 1200 calories max a day can i do it or is it unrealistic?

answers.answer_content: My friend did and shes looking great! You have to stick to your diet though. NO CHEATING. Chicken is good to eat because it has a lot of protein and low carbs/fat
